import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { filterByType } from "../../redux/actions"; import style from './Filter.module.css' const Filter = () => { const filteredType = useSelector(state => state.filteredType) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleFilter = (event) => { dispatch(filterByType(event.target.value)) } return (
) } export default Filter;
